text: (ye log tumhaare saamane) to kah dete hain ki ham (aapake) faramaabaradaar hain lekin jab tumhaare paas se baahar nikale to unamen se kuchh log jo kuchh tumase kah chuke the usake khilaaf raaton ko mashavara karate hain haaloki (ye nahin samajhate) ye log raaton ko jo kuchh bhee mashavara karate hain use khuda likhata jaata hai paas tum un logon kee kuchh paravaah na karo aur khuda par bharosa rakho aur khuda kaarasaazee ke lie kaafee hai
